entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 02:24 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 02:24 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 02:24 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
